aerith.name: Aerith
aerith.ability: Air of Vulnerability -- This card takes 2x damage from attacks done to it while in the party slots.

attack1.name: Healing Prayer
attack1.description: Heal 10 hp from each party member and remove all status conditions.

alexlouisarmstrongex.name: Alex Louis Armstrong EX
alexlouisarmstrongex.ability: Armstrong Lineage -- if Olivier Mira Armstrong is in play as an ally, +50 to Alex Louis Armstrong's Attacks.

attack2.name: Alchemical Spikes
attack2.description: Does 40 damage to the opponent's party 2

allmightex.name: All Might EX
allmightex.ability: I Am Here -- When this card enters the active spot, remove all debuffs from the player's side of the field. While this card is in play, Characters can not be affected by debuffs.

attack2.name: United States of Smash
attack2.description: If this attack succeeds, retreat this card back into your hand.

attack1.name: Purify
attack1.description: Heal 20 damage from an allied card.

attack2.name: Panicked Staff
attack2.description: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does nothing.

attack1.name: Invisible Wind
attack1.description: This attack will always deal a minimum of 30 damage. Even if the opponent's active card is unable to be attacked.

attack2.name: Excalibur
attack2.description: discard all energies from this card, deal 30 damage to all of the opponent's non-active cards that can be damaged.

asabaharumasa.name: Asaba Harumasa
asabaharumasa.ability: No one cares more about my safety -- When this card is at or between 70 and 10 hp, it takes 10 damage every other turn, but does +30 damage on every attack.

attack1.name: Cloud Piercer
attack1.description: Every consecutive use of Cloud Piercer does +10 damage on the last, caps at +60 damage.

attack2.name: Ha-Oto no Ya
attack2.description: Ignore stage all applied damage changes including invincibility. Discard one Electric energy. This card cannot retreat during its next turn.

aunnkomano.name: Aunn Komano
aunnkomano.ability: Exorcism Aura (Komano) -- When an energy is attached to this card, alternating every two turns, the first attack against this and any allied characters vertically aligned with this card ot the same with the cards horizantally aligned, Party 1 and 3 if active does 20 less damage.

attack1.name: Rotating Shots
attack1.description: Hits the opponent's active card, Party 1, and Party 3.

aventurineex.name: Aventurine EX
aventurineex.ability: Conerstone Deluxe -- No characters in your party as if using Cornerstone Deluxe will take any damage during the opponent's next turn. Effect ends at the start of this player's next turn. End your turn once you activate this ability.

attack1.name: Willing to take that bet
attack1.description: Have the opponent search through their draw deck and pull out the first Character or E Character and shows it to the attacker, If their HP is below the amount of energies on this card (each energy being 10 hp), the opponent discards the drawn card and the attacker takes the reward respective to the discarded card, otherwise, the drawn card is moved to the opponent’s hand. Once this ability is used, discard ALL energy from this card.

attack1.name: Balloon Arrow
attack1.description: During the opponent's next turn, their active character is not affected by stage effects.

bender.name: Bender
bender.ability: Fourty Percent Digital -- At the start of your turn, you may discard a digital energy. If you do, heal 40hp from this card.

attack1.name: Good Vibes
attack1.description: If the opposing card is negative or has negative energies on it, this attack deals 20 damage. Attach a positive energy to an allied card.

attack2.name: Adventure
attack2.description: Draw a random card from the draw deck

attack1.name: Swing
attack1.description: If no other actions are used by the player during this turn than using this attack, this attack does +30 damage.

attack2.name: Shadow Clone
attack2.description: If the opponent attacks, during the opponent’s turn, sacrifice the energy that is not part of the three negative energies used in the attack, nullify the attack, do 40 Omni Damage, and move this card into the party.

attack2.name: Shiny Snowdrift
attack2.description: The defending character is now paralyzed.

attack2.name: Glorious Inferno
attack2.description: Every card in both parties take 20 fire damage, excluding active cards.

alexlouisarmstrongexspecial.name: Alex Louis Armstrong EX
alexlouisarmstrongexspecial.ability: Armstrong Lineage -- if Olivier Mira Armstrong is in play as an ally, +50 to Alex Louis Armstrong's Attacks.

attack2.name: Alchemical Spikes
